name: choc chunk
description: Ah the classic chocolate chunk. The quintessential cookie for dunking into a glass of cold milk. But this aint yo’ usual choco chunk cookie. We believe a good choc chunk has to have high quality chocolate and lots of it. So we only use big chunks of Whittaker’s chocolate & bake it so it’s crunchy on the outside but soft & chewy on the inside.

name: cinnamon
description: The underdog of the cookie world. Whilst it may look plain, it is a staff favourite. This cookie tastes like a cinnamon donut, Easter & happiness all rolled into one. Soft, chewy and fluffy in texture, it works a treat with a cup of coffee or tea.

name: snickers bar
description: We managed to shove half a Snickers Bar in this cookie to form a chewy, nougaty, caramelly, nutty and incredibly popular cookie. You won’t want to share this one so make sure you get more than one.

name: black forest
description: Dark Whittaker’s chocolate & dried berries enveloped with premium Dutch cocoa dough. Rich, moist & incredibly moreish, this cookie has a cult following.

name: nutella
description: If you love Nutella, you’ll love this cookie. We pipe the smooth chocolate hazelnut spread into the centre of each cookie & top it off with crunchy hazelnuts.

name: Oreo Marshmallow
description: Melted marshmallow on the inside with crunchy marshmallow & crushed oreos on the outside. The cookie dough is made using premium Dutch cocoa that is produced in Holland from the finest West African Cocoa beans. It gives off a bittersweet taste & a deep rich chocolate colour.

name: Peanut Butter
description: Peanut Butter lovers unite. We hand-pipe peanut butter straight into the centre of the cookie and top it with rich Whittaker’s chocolate. Dunk it in cold milk & you’ve got yourself a good day.

name: White Choc Macadamia
description: What separates this white chocolate macadamia cookie from the others out there is how jam-packed it is with quality ingredients. Cheap chocolate and tiny little crumbs of macadamia? Forget it. We only use wonderful Whittakers White chocolate and large macadamia halves.

name: Test Product
description: What separates this white chocolate macadamia cookie from the others out there is how jam-packed it is with quality ingredients. Cheap chocolate and tiny little crumbs of macadamia? Forget it. We only use wonderful Whittakers White chocolate and large macadamia halves.
